content: Calavo Growers, Inc. (NASDAQ:CVGW) is one of the 10 best organic food and farming stocks to buy now. On June 9, 2025, the company reported Q2 net sales of $190.5 million, a 3.3% year-over-year increa… [+2196 chars]
